articles.title: Massive Fallout 4 Mod Fallout London Finally Has a Release Date — and It’s Today - IGN
articles.description: The hotly anticipated Fallout 4 mod, Fallout London, is out now.
articles.content:
UPDATE: The Fallout London mod is out now, available to download from GOG.
If you download the mod via GOG, it will work with Fallout 4: Game of the Year Edition from both GOG and Steam.
